🔥 IGNITE YOUR BONES 🔥 

 [  HOME  //  RULES  //  FACES  //  WANTEDS  //  DISCORD  ]
Welcome to IGNITE YOUR BONES! GUESS WHAT? IT’S OUR THIRD BIRTHDAY! We’re officially THREE YEARS OLD! Come hang with us and join our LOS ANGELES based miracle! Warmer weather is finally here and with that, we have new events, new challenges, and a whole host of other goodies coming your way! As always, we have a huge community, a plethora of codes (over 8k exclusive codes), and a friendly staff willing to help with just about anything. If you’re looking for a super laid back, mature (18+) roleplay site with a lot of active members, IGNITE is the place for you!

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

MAIN || CHARACTER || RULES || APPLY

summary: Remus and Sirius! Everyone’s paying attention to reg, ant, barty, and james, but no one’s paying attention to y’all! How have...
question: Remus and Sirius! Everyone’s paying attention to reg, ant, barty, and james, but no one’s paying attention to y’all! How have y’all been?
answer:
Sirius: Not fine at all. The lack of attention is suffocating me and soon I will have no air left in my lungs and-

Remus: -Sirius is being a drama queen, as usual.

tags: stupid books i love so much
its impossible to 100% enjoy rereading them because i know all the terrible things that are going to happen to these people
like sirius is sneaking around being a dog and im like MATE GO SAY HI TO YOUR GODSON YOU DONT HAVE MUCH TIME liiiiikkkeeeeee
harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban
summary: so im rereading prisoner of azkaban and i got to the part where they’re all up hella late celebrating a quidditch win in the...
body:
so im rereading prisoner of azkaban and i got to the part where they’re all up hella late celebrating a quidditch win in the gryffindor tower, and mcgonagall comes and tells them all to go tf to bed. then sirius bursts in like a lunatic looking for a rat and scares the shit out of ron and everyone starts screaming and wandering about all confused. and fred goes “excellent, are we carrying on?!”

and had a tiny moment thinking ‘it’s funny cos theyre all relatively young rn so their big party night was sweets and fireworks BOY imagine the nights this guy’ll have in his university years what a mad lad’ 

and then i of course remembered that fred will not make it to that late-teens/early twenties age of being an idiot and drinking too much and making mistakes that never end up mattering and now my heart hurts

summary: ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student...
caption:
ROANOKE UNIVERSITY RPG

Here at Roanoke University magic is everywhere. It fills in all the nooks and crannies so that no student could ever be on the grounds without feeling its presence. Students who have graduated from magical secondary schools all over the world choose Roanoke to continue their magical education. There are majors for those of all walks of life and every student who graduates will be prepared to join the magical world knowing they have the proper education.

In the year 2018, when tensions are high in the no-maj world the tensions are just as high on the magical side. There is a rise of young witches and wizards who are done living in the shadows. There is equal push-back from those who fear the repercussions of revealing themselves to no-majs. Rappaport’s Law is in place for a reason. American wizards and witches have been shown time and time again how no-majs couldn’t be trusted. They had been killing and persecuting wizards and witches for centuries. How will a campus filled with students from all over the world deal with each side of the debate?

MAIN || CHARACTER || RULES || APPLY

summary: A huge anniversary for Australia’s least-loved wizarding school, and a ministry determined to address the “troublesome” nature...
caption:
A huge anniversary for Australia’s least-loved wizarding school, and a ministry determined to address the “troublesome” nature of the disadvantaged young witches and wizards unable to afford places at the prestigious private magical schools.

It really is a long way to the top, if you want to rock and roll.

Students. Professors. Quidditch. Duelling. Ministry. Find your place in an open plot structure that really allows each character to have an impact. 

Backed by a friendly and welcoming OOC community with strong community values, Tallygarunga is the RP home away from home. Welcoming members 18+, with no requirement to know much about Harry Potter, or Australia!

TALLYGARUNGA

Regret nothing.

HOME | RULES | CREATION GUIDE | DISCORD

reblog.comment:
A huge anniversary for Australia’s least-loved wizarding school, and a ministry determined to address the “troublesome” nature of the disadvantaged young witches and wizards unable to afford places at the prestigious private magical schools.

It really is a long way to the top, if you want to rock and roll.

Students. Professors. Quidditch. Duelling. Ministry. Find your place in an open plot structure that really allows each character to have an impact. 

Backed by a friendly and welcoming OOC community with strong community values, Tallygarunga is the RP home away from home. Welcoming members 18+, with no requirement to know much about Harry Potter, or Australia!

TALLYGARUNGA

Regret nothing.

HOME | RULES | CREATION GUIDE | DISCORD

trail.content_raw:
A huge anniversary for Australia’s least-loved wizarding school, and a ministry determined to address the “troublesome” nature of the disadvantaged young witches and wizards unable to afford places at the prestigious private magical schools.

It really is a long way to the top, if you want to rock and roll.

Students. Professors. Quidditch. Duelling. Ministry. Find your place in an open plot structure that really allows each character to have an impact. 

Backed by a friendly and welcoming OOC community with strong community values, Tallygarunga is the RP home away from home. Welcoming members 18+, with no requirement to know much about Harry Potter, or Australia!

TALLYGARUNGA

Regret nothing.

HOME | RULES | CREATION GUIDE | DISCORD
